title: Copyright Issues in Generative AI Learning Data and Educational Responses

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course cultivating legal analysis and case application skills to resolve generative AI copyright issues within social studies contexts for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the legal logic of copyright issues arising in generative AI learning processes.
Learners can evaluate AI training data usage cases from a copyright law perspective and propose appropriate solutions.
Learners can create practical guidelines to prevent copyright disputes when utilizing generative AI in educational settings.

resources: Access rights to a copyright case law database
AI training data case compilation PDF
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
